ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Absolutely not.  The shaman spell is 60 hp for 20 mana, exactly the same.  The only difference is Shaman get regen rather early and can get an advantage
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Naeeldar wrote:

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh yes well the shaman form of the spell is a lot more efficent then the
> mana stone. The necro form of it is the best in the game the level 34 spell
> for it trades 15hp for 15mana. The manastone is not that efficent at all.
>
Absolutely not. The shaman spell is 60 hp for 20 mana, exactly
the same. The only difference is Shaman get regen rather early and can
get an advantage out of using the stone without outside assistance.

Miriana Windryder
